checkout.notConfigured: Stripe is not properly configured. Please contact support.

outOfCredits.title: You're Out of Credits
outOfCredits.description: Purchase credits to continue using the API, or subscribe for better value.
outOfCredits.subscribeNote: Subscribe for up to 58% cheaper credits
outOfCredits.subscribeCta: Get monthly credits with automatic rollover, plus 11-58% cheaper per-credit pricing.

insufficientCredits.title: Not Enough Credits
insufficientCredits.description: This operation requires {requiredCredits} credits. You have {currentBalance}.
insufficientCredits.reduceBatch: Or adjust your operation to use fewer credits

cancelSubscription.title: Cancel Subscription
cancelSubscription.info: Your {planName} plan will remain active until {formattedEndDate}.
cancelSubscription.keepAccess: You won't be charged again, but you'll keep full access to your subscription benefits until the end of your current billing period.
cancelSubscription.confirmationText: Your subscription will be canceled and you won't be charged again after {formattedEndDate}.
cancelSubscription.otherPlaceholder: Please tell us why you're canceling...

planChange.scheduledText: Your plan will change to {newPlan} on {effectiveDate}.
planChange.keepBenefits: You'll keep your current {currentPlan} plan benefits until then. No refund or additional charges.

banner.expirationText: Your {creditCount} credit{creditPlural, plural, one {} other {s}} will expire on {formattedDate}{timeRemainder}. Use them before they're gone!
